title: Base Entity Definition
description: Common metadata, provenance, and security fields for all entities.

id.description: The internal Entity Management System identifier (the 'golden' record ID).

securityMarkings.description: List of security classification markings (e.g., OFFICIAL, SENSITIVE).

provenance.description: Data about the origin of this entity record.

sourceSystem.description: The system the data originated from (e.g., CRM, HR, Senzing-Feed-A).

sourceRecordId.description: The original unique ID of the record in the source system.

createdDate.description: Timestamp of initial record creation in the source system.

lastUpdatedDate.description: Timestamp of the last update to the source record.
